# Research degrees

We have opportunities for prospective postgraduate researchers. Example projects and funding opportunities can be found in our PhD directory.

Previous topics have included:

- Data-driven demand modelling
- Machine learning for traffic forecasting
- Spatial analysis of transport accessibility
- Mobility behaviour modelling using large-scale datasets

For details on applying, funding, and supervisors, please see the ITS PhD pages or contact our postgraduate admissions team.
